Repeatedly injecting these into the bodies of young children can lead to serious health issues. Many vaccines also contain aborted fetal tissue, which is deeply concerning on both health and moral grounds.

Secondly, the vaccine schedule has exploded in recent decades. Children now receive over 70 doses of vaccines by age 18. This massive assault on the immune system in critical developmental windows is simply unnatural. We are seeing skyrocketing rates of autoimmune disorders, allergies, asthma, and neurological problems in children that correlate with this dramatic increase in vaccination.

Thirdly, vaccine makers are shielded from liability. If your child is injured by a vaccine, you cannot sue the manufacturer. This removes any incentive for them to ensure the safety of their products. The government has paid out billions to families of vaccine-injured children through a secret vaccine court, but most people are unaware of this.

Finally, the science on vaccine safety is far from settled. The studies are often funded by vaccine makers and rife with conflicts of interest. There have never been any large, long-term, double-blind placebo-controlled studies comparing the health outcomes of vaccinated vs. unvaccinated children. The data we do have suggests unvaccinated children are healthier.

While vaccines may provide some temporary protection against a few specific diseases, the risks to overall health are simply not worth it. Parents deserve to be fully informed and make their own choices about these medical interventions. The benefits of vaccination are overstated while the risks are very real. We must put children's long-term health first.
